en.alt: C√©dric is an excellent host. We stayed at the studio for roughly ~3 months. First, the location is beautiful - peace is what you will find there. It is conveniently close to a supermarket, a restaurants, and train stop (13 min walk) Walking from the studio to the train stop, you will meet goats, sheep, cows and horses while appreciating the Fribourgeois landscape. Cedric was always attentive and was fully invested in assisting us whenever we needed, and it is easy to have a nice conversation with him. With his guidance, we learned so much about the area, where to find, how to get around, etc. If you are looking to explore Switzerland üá®üá≠ and/or you consider staying in Fribourg, I give my strongest recommendation to C&C Eco Studio!
en.author: Etienne Palos
en.caption: C√©dric is an excellent host

en.alt: Very friendly and responsive host. We will come back. Very peaceful and charming place.
en.author: Florence Berguerre
en.caption: Very friendly and responsive host
